Detailed Description

Walk along a BAM or along BAM regions and stream in/out reads

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SnowTools::BamWalker::BamWalker ( const std::string &  in,
const std::string &  out 
)

Construct a new BamWalker for streaming data in and streaming out to a new BAM file.

This constructor will open the BAM file and read the header. It will also open the out BAM file.

SnowTools::BamWalker::BamWalker ( const std::string &  in  ) 

Construct a new BamWalker for reading a BAM

SnowTools::BamWalker::BamWalker (  )  [inline]

Construct an empty BamWalker

SnowTools::BamWalker::~BamWalker (  )  [inline]

Destroy a BamWalker and close all connections to the BAM

Calling the destructor will take care of all of the C-style dealloc calls required within HTSlib to close a BAM or SAM file.

Member Function Documentation

const MiniRulesCollection& SnowTools::BamWalker::GetMiniRulesCollection (  )  const [inline]

Return the MiniRulesCollection object used by this BamWalker

bool SnowTools::BamWalker::GetNextRead ( Read &  r,
std::string &  ref 
)

Retrieve the next read from the BAM.

If a MiniRulesCollection is defined for this BAM will grab the next valid read. r Read to fill with data ref String identifying which rule this read passed. Empty if not passed

Returns:
true if the next read is available

void SnowTools::BamWalker::printRuntimeMessage ( const ReadCount &  rc_main,
const Read &  r 
) const

Print a run-time message to stdout.

Prints a message about all of the reads that have been visited, and informaiton about the current read

void SnowTools::BamWalker::setBamWalkerRegion ( const GenomicRegion &  gp  ) 

Set a part of the BAM to walk.

This will set the BAM pointer to the given region.

Parameters:
gp Location to point the BAM to
void SnowTools::BamWalker::setBamWalkerRegions ( const GenomicRegionVector &  grv  ) 

Set up multiple regions. Overwrites current regions.

This will set the BAM pointer to the first element of the input list.

Parameters:
grv Set of location to point BAM to
void SnowTools::BamWalker::SetMiniRulesCollection ( const MiniRulesCollection &  mr  )  [inline]

Explicitly provide a MiniRulesCollection to this BamWalker

void SnowTools::BamWalker::SetMiniRulesCollection ( const std::string &  rules  ) 

Pass a MiniRules script to the BAM.

This will call the constructor of MiniRulesCollection, and parse the provides rules and add it as a rule set to this BamWalker.

Parameters:
rules A string of rules, or a file pointing to a rules script
